# simplix-react Â· Package-first React Framework

> Define once. Derive everything.

simplix-react is a package-first React framework that auto-generates reusable domain packages from OpenAPI specs. Define your API surface once with Zod schemas, and the framework derives type-safe HTTP clients, React Query hooks, MSW mock handlers, and i18n bundles automatically.

### Core Concepts

- [Schema Derivation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/docs/core-concepts/schema-derivation.md): The five-stage pipeline from defineApi through deriveClient, deriveQueryKeys, deriveHooks, and deriveMockHandlers
- [Cache Invalidation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/docs/core-concepts/cache-invalidation.md): Automatic query invalidation strategy, optimistic updates, and operation-level cache control
- [Mock Data Layer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/docs/core-concepts/mock-data-layer.md): MSW + PGlite architecture for in-browser PostgreSQL-backed mock APIs

### Package References
- [@simplix-react/contract](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/packages/contract/README.md): Zod-based type-safe API contract definitions with defineApi, deriveClient, and deriveQueryKeys
- [@simplix-react/react](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/packages/react/README.md): Derives TanStack Query hooks (useList, useGet, useCreate, useUpdate, useDelete, useInfiniteList) from contracts
- [@simplix-react/mock](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/packages/mock/README.md): Auto-generated MSW handlers and PGlite repositories with SQL utilities and migration helpers
- [@simplix-react/i18n](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/packages/i18n/README.md): Internationalization framework with adapter pattern, i18next integration, and React bindings
- [@simplix-react/testing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/packages/testing/README.md): Testing utilities with pre-configured QueryClient, wrapper components, and in-memory mock clients
- [@simplix-react/cli](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/simplix-react/simplix-react/main/packages/cli/README.md): CLI for project scaffolding, domain/module generation, validation, i18n codegen, and OpenAPI import
